类 PHD

  • java.lang.Object
    • PHD

  • public class PHD
extends java.lang.Object
    Time Spent: 7 hours An instance maintains info about the PHD of a person.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      PHD advisor1
      month PHD awarded, range:1-12,1 for January
      PHD advisor2
      1st advisor of this person advisor 1 is 'null'if unknown
      int numadvisees
      2nd advisor of this person advisor 2 is 'null'if unknown or only had advisor1 or advisor1=unkown

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PHD(java.lang.String n, char g, int y, int m)
      Constructor1: an instance for a person with name n,gender g, PHD year y, and PHD month m.
      PHD(java.lang.String n, char g, int y, int m, PHD adv)
      Constructor2: a PHD with name n, gender g, PHD year y, PHD month m, first advisor adv, and no second advisor.
      PHD(java.lang.String n, char g, int y, int m, PHD adv1, PHD adv2)
      Constructor3: a PHD with name n, gender g, PHD year y, PHD month m, first advisor adv1, and second advisor adv2.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PHD advisor1()
      Return the first advisor of this PHD (null if unknown)
      PHD advisor2()
      Return the second advisor of this PHD (null if unknown or non-existent)
      boolean arePHDSiblings(PHD p)
      Return value of “p is not null and this person and p are intellectual siblings."
      int getMonth()
      Return the month this person got their PHD
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the name of this person
      int getYear()
      Return the year this person got their PHD
      boolean gotBefore(PHD p)
      Return value of "this person got their PHD before p did."
      boolean isMale()
      Return the value of the sentence "This person is male."
      int numAdvisees()
      Return the number of PHD advisees of this person.
      void setAdvisor1(PHD p)
      Add p as the first advisor of this person.
      void setAdvisor2(PHD p)
      Add p as the second advisor of this person.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • advisor1

        public PHD advisor1
        month PHD awarded, range:1-12,1 for January

      • advisor2

        public PHD advisor2
        1st advisor of this person advisor 1 is 'null'if unknown

      • numadvisees

        public int numadvisees
        2nd advisor of this person advisor 2 is 'null'if unknown or only had advisor1 or advisor1=unkown

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PHD

        public PHD(java.lang.String n,
           char g,
           int y,
           int m)
        Constructor1: an instance for a person with name n,gender g, PHD year y, and PHD month m. Its advisors are unknown, and it has no advisees. Precondition: n has at least 1 char. m is in 1..12. g is 'f' for female or 'm' for male

      • PHD

        public PHD(java.lang.String n,
           char g,
           int y,
           int m,
           PHD adv)
        Constructor2: a PHD with name n, gender g, PHD year y, PHD month m, first advisor adv, and no second advisor. Precondition: n has at least 1 char,g is 'f' for female or 'm' for male, m is in 1..12, and adv is not null.

      • PHD

        public PHD(java.lang.String n,
           char g,
           int y,
           int m,
           PHD adv1,
           PHD adv2)
        Constructor3: a PHD with name n, gender g, PHD year y, PHD month m, first advisor adv1, and second advisor adv2. Precondition: n has at least 1 char.g is 'f' for female or 'm' for male. m is in 1..12.adv1 and adv2 are not null.adv1 and adv2 are different.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Return the name of this person

      • getYear

        public int getYear()
        Return the year this person got their PHD

      • getMonth

        public int getMonth()
        Return the month this person got their PHD

      • isMale

        public boolean isMale()
        Return the value of the sentence "This person is male."

      • advisor1

        public PHD advisor1()
        Return the first advisor of this PHD (null if unknown)

      • advisor2

        public PHD advisor2()
        Return the second advisor of this PHD (null if unknown or non-existent)

      • numAdvisees

        public int numAdvisees()
        Return the number of PHD advisees of this person.

      • setAdvisor1

        public void setAdvisor1(PHD p)
        Add p as the first advisor of this person. Precondition: the first advisor is unknown and p is not null.

      • setAdvisor2

        public void setAdvisor2(PHD p)
        Add p as the second advisor of this person. Precondition:The first advisor (of this person) is known, the second advisoris unknown, p is not null, and p is different from the first advisor.

      • gotBefore

        public boolean gotBefore(PHD p)
        Return value of "this person got their PHD before p did." Precondition: p is not null.

      • arePHDSiblings

        public boolean arePHDSiblings(PHD p)
        Return value of “p is not null and this person and p are intellectual siblings."
